news.title: Mahabubnagar: Husband, Frustrated by Wife’s Extramarital Affairs, Commits Crime with Children
news.description: Frustrated by his wife’s extramarital affairs, a father turned into a murderer. He warned her against such relationships early in their marriage, but her behavior persisted. He assaulted her, served jail time, changed residences after village mediation, and eventually left her. Despite this, her behavior did not change. Ultimately, to secure his children’s future and marriages, he and his son killed her.
news.content: In Mahabubnagar, a husband, driven to despair by his wife’s persistent extramarital affairs, collaborated with his son to murder her, citing the need to protect their family’s future.
news.creator: Suresh Reddy

news.title: Catalonia Excluded from Migrant Minors Distribution but Offers to Host Around Thirty
news.description: The Spanish government has decided where and with what resources the 3,975 unaccompanied foreign minors currently in the Canary Islands, Ceuta, and Melilla will be relocated. Neither Catalonia nor the Basque Country will participate in this distribution due to prior reception efforts. Most minors will be relocated to Andalusia (677), Madrid (647), and the Valencian Community (571).
news.content: Catalonia, despite being excluded from the Spanish government's plan to distribute 3,975 unaccompanied migrant minors, has volunteered to host around thirty, showcasing its commitment to humanitarian efforts.

news.title: Rossnowlagh Twelfth 2025: 35 of the Best Pictures as Thousands Gather in Co Donegal for Annual Orange Order Demonstration
news.description: Thousands of people, including many from across Northern Ireland, descended on Rossnowlagh in Co Donegal on Saturday for the annual Twelfth celebrations, joined by over 50 lodges from Donegal, Cavan, Leitrim, and Monaghan, in a scenic procession along the Atlantic coastline.
news.content: The Rossnowlagh Twelfth parade, held on July 5, 2025, attracted thousands to Co Donegal for a vibrant Orange Order demonstration. Over 50 lodges from Donegal, Cavan, Leitrim, and Monaghan, alongside visitors from Northern Ireland and beyond, participated in the family-friendly event, starting at St John’s Parish Church and concluding at a demonstration field by the Atlantic shore. A religious service was held at 3 PM, led by Canon Rev Brian Russell, with a collection for Orange charities.
news.creator: Valerie Martin

news.title: Number of Immigrants Nearly Triples in Rio Grande do Norte in 12 Years
news.description: The number of foreigners choosing Rio Grande do Norte as their new home has nearly tripled in just over a decade. According to the 2022 Demographic Census by IBGE, the immigrant population in the state grew from 1,753 in 2010 to a significantly higher figure.
news.content: The immigrant population in Rio Grande do Norte surged from 1,753 in 2010 to nearly three times that number by 2022, reflecting the state’s growing appeal as a destination for foreigners seeking new opportunities.
news.creator: Bruno Vital

news.title: Oiticica Dam, Delayed by Construction and Sparse Rains, at 13% Capacity
news.description: Inaugurated in March 2025 to ensure water security for thousands of Potiguares, the Oiticica Dam holds only 103.3 million cubic meters of water, or 13.92% of its 742.6 million cubic meter capacity, due to construction delays and insufficient rainfall.
news.content: The Oiticica Dam, intended to secure water supply in Rio Grande do Norte, is struggling with just 13.92% capacity due to delayed construction and low rainfall, raising concerns about water scarcity.
news.creator: Felipe Salustino

news.title: Heatwave: What Is Heatstroke? How to Prevent It?
news.description: Heatstroke occurs when the body’s ability to dissipate heat is overwhelmed, preventing it from cooling down effectively.

news.title: Emma Navarro Beats Defending Wimbledon Champ Barbora Krejcikova, Ensuring a First-Time Winner
news.description: Defending Wimbledon champion Barbora Krejcikova lost to No. 10 seed Emma Navarro 2-6, 6-3, 6-4 in the third round, extending a recent trend of one-and-done winners at the All England Club.
news.content: Emma Navarro’s upset victory over defending champion Barbora Krejcikova in Wimbledon’s third round guarantees a new women’s champion, continuing the tournament’s streak of surprise outcomes.
news.creator: James Carter

news.title: Gjilani Terminates Contract with Kenan Haxhihamza
news.description: Gjilani announced the termination of their contract with footballer Kenan Haxhihamza, with the agreement mutually reached between both parties, though no further details were provided.
news.content: Gjilani and Kenan Haxhihamza parted ways amicably, with the club confirming the mutual termination of the footballer’s contract as they prepare for the upcoming season.
news.creator: Arben Krasniqi

news.title: What’s the Secret of the Red Lake That Turns Animals to Stone?
news.description: Located in Africa's East Rift Valley, Lake Natron captivates with its eerie red color and the 'petrified' animal remains surrounding it, raising questions about its unique properties.
news.content: Lake Natron’s striking red hue and petrified animal remains, caused by its high alkalinity and extreme conditions, continue to intrigue scientists and visitors alike.
news.creator: Ahmet Yılmaz

news.title: Insomniac May Release Venom on PS5 Before Marvel’s Wolverine, Followed by Spider-Man 3
news.description: A rumored leaker suggests Insomniac Games’ updated roadmap includes launching Venom on PS5 before Marvel’s Wolverine, with Spider-Man 3 to follow.
news.content: Insomniac Games is reportedly prioritizing a PS5 Venom game release ahead of Marvel’s Wolverine, with Spider-Man 3 planned next, according to a leaked roadmap.
news.creator: Luca Bianchi

news.title: Mercado Libre Offers Ideal Phone for Clumsy Users: Realme C75 at Nearly Half Price
news.description: The Realme C75, priced at $3,455 on Mercado Libre, offers 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, a 6,000mAh battery, and IP66/68/69 certifications for durability against drops and water submersion.
news.content: Mercado Libre’s Realme C75, at nearly half price, combines robust 360-degree impact resistance, a powerful battery, and high performance, making it perfect for accident-prone users.
news.creator: Mauricio Herrera

news.title: ‘I’m Really Sorry’: Jonathan Milan and Tim Merlier Disappointed to Miss Tour de France Sprint on Stage 1
news.description: Big-name sprinters Jonathan Milan and Tim Merlier were left to fight for 39th place after missing a decisive split in the peloton during stage 1 of the Tour de France.
news.content: Jonathan Milan and Tim Merlier expressed regret after missing a critical peloton split in Tour de France’s stage 1, relegating them to a distant 39th place in the sprint.
news.creator: Stephen Farrand

news.title: Honor Prepares Magic V Flip 2; Launch Scheduled for August with Minor Hardware Upgrades
news.description: Honor is set to launch the Magic V Flip 2, the successor to its foldable phone, in August, featuring minor hardware upgrades, according to social media leaks from China.
news.content: Honor’s Magic V Flip 2, slated for an August release, promises subtle hardware improvements, building on the success of its foldable predecessor, as per Chinese social media leaks.
news.creator: Szilárd-Ervin Szőgyényi

news.title: Bayern Munich Midfielder Jamal Musiala Badly Injures Leg Against PSG at Club World Cup
news.description: Bayern Munich midfielder Jamal Musiala suffered a severe leg injury during a Club World Cup quarterfinal match against Paris Saint-Germain, forcing him to leave the game.
news.content: Jamal Musiala’s serious leg injury during Bayern Munich’s Club World Cup quarterfinal against PSG has raised concerns about his recovery and the team’s midfield strength.
news.creator: Allyn Tucker
